casebody.data:
FREDERICK J. ADLER v. FRANCES R. THORNE [No. 52,

October Term, 1937.]

Decided December 10th, 1937.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Ofputt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ.

T. Howard Duckett, with whom was Le Roy Humphrey on the brief, for the appellant. Arthur C. Keefer and T. Hammond Welsh, Jr., for the appellee.

The opinion was delivered per Curiam.
